resources.string: A patient man will eat ripe fruit. -Africa
A large chair does not make a king. -Sudan
He who thinks he is leading and has no one following him, is only taking a walk. -Malawi
The old woman looks after the child to grow its teeth, and the young one in turn looks after the old woman when she loses her teeth. -Ghana
A united family eats from the same plate. \n -Uganda
If you are filled with pride, then you will have no room for wisdom. -Africa
Knowledge without wisdom is like water in the sand. -Guinea
You do not teach the paths of the forest to an old gorilla. -Congo
To be without a friend is to be poor indeed. -Tanzania
Return to old watering holes for more than water; friends and dreams are there to meet you. -Africa
